result.title: Report on the possible production processes of organic and hybrid aerogels and comparison with the state of the art
result.description:
Report assessing the following points:
-Requirements and bottlenecks for processes towards mass production -Review of the present market for synthetic polymer aerogels -Review of the state of the art of organic aerogel production with the focus on comparison monoliths/particles; potential for scale up and equipment -Choice of the common process for particle production based on and polyurethanes, polyureas, polyamides

result.title: Dissemination and Communication Plan ( first period)
result.description: Dissemination and communication activities will be reported twice during the project. The first report contains all activities during the first period of the project (M1 – M18). A list of planned and implemented dissemination and communication activities will, however, be kept updated continuously throughout the project. As described in detail in Section 2.2, dissemination activities will include several stakeholder workshops, a number of policy briefs, publications and reports. Related to task T7.4.
